Usage:
1. unzip
2. Copy Update folder to the game directory 
3. Copy Crack folder the game directory 
4. Run game

The game can change the user name UserName in nfs.3dm.ini , but can not be Chinese .

UserID and SaveID can leave it in your My Documents  Ghost Games  Need for Speed Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹(TM) Rivals  filename settings under sav archive , another once you start the game do not modify these two , or need to scratch began to play.

Your antivirus will detect a virus in the crack but It's a false positive !

Bug Fixes
Additional stability improvements
Improvements to performance and frame rate
Improvements around host migration user experience
Issues around host migration include:
Improvements to instances where SP is lost after a host migration for a number of speed lists
Issues with speed list objectives could not be completed after a host migration have been improved.
Improvements have been made to game stability around host migration.
